column4: good evening, last night i downloaded the breezy RC. and im currently in install phase 2. the problem is, every single file is downloading is giving me this error: "The failed "Read Cd/Dvd Capacity" packet command was: Incompatible medium installed" Ubuntu is being installed on a HP dv1340us laptop. any suggestions/opinions?
have you tried burning the cd again?
why burn the cd again? it's currently on install phase 2. which it isn't using any CD at all.
